sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../style/index.css' const Header = () => { const [styleState, setStyleState] = useState({ style: { display: 'flex', height: '80px', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'strech', justifyContent: 'space-evenly', paddingTop: '15px', paddingBottom: '10px', paddingLeft: '40px', backgroundColor: 'rgb(218, 212, 212)', }, searchButtonStyle: { alignSelf: 'flex-start', justifySelf: 'flex-start', marginRigth: '20px', background: 'black', color: 'white', borderRadius: '25px 25px 25px 25px', height: '45px', width: '90px', border: 'none', outline: 'none', fontFamily: 'Roboto', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', boxShadow: '3px 5px 20px 3px grey', }, searchBoxStyle: { marginRight: '30px', borderRadius: '20px 20px 20px 20px', border: '1px solid', height: '40px', boxShadow: '1px 3px 10px 1px grey', fontFamily: 'Roboto', outline: 'none', paddingLeft: '10px', }, iconStyle: { justifySelf: 'flex-end', alignSelf: 'flex-end', cursor: 'pointer', paddingTop: '5px', }, }) const searchBarCloseHandler = () => { setStyleState({ style: { display: 'none', }, }) } return (
) } export default Header
